quote.main: You didn’t come before or after, you came right on time. Right on time for me to fall in love with you.

gifts.mainPhrase: We deeply appreciate all your love and support as we begin this new chapter of building our home together.
gifts.envelope: There will be a box for envelopes at the event if you wish to give a cash gift, or if you prefer, you may make a bank transfer to the following account:
gifts.clickHereText: Click <1>here</1> to visit our gift table

introduction.line1: We wish to share with you the joy of our union
introduction.line2: With God’s blessing and the unconditional support of our parents
introduction.line3: Together with our families, we invite you to be part of this beautiful union

RSVP.title: Confirm Your Attendance!
RSVP.subtitle: We would love to have you with us on our special day
RSVP.notAttendingLabel: I will not be able to attend
RSVP.successMessage: Thank you for confirming your attendance! If you need to make any changes, you are still able to update your response.
RSVP.rsvpConfirmedMessage: You have confirmed your attendance for {{count}} people.
RSVP.dateLineEnd: We’re sorry, the RSVP deadline has passed.
RSVP.dateLineStart: Please help us by confirming your attendance before
RSVP.placesReserved: We have reserved 1 seat for you.
RSVP.placesReserved_plural: We have reserved {{count}} seats for you.
RSVP.errorMessage: There was an error sending your confirmation. Please try again later.

NoKidsMessageTitle: Mom and Dad Deserve a Day Off!
